name: Duck Factory 2
description:
This is a submission to https://itch.io/jam/trijam-57

IT IS MADE IN MORE THAN 3h! (I was slow and kinda lazy to time it... was around 4h... I hope you enjoy it!)

Since the theme was factory, I just had to make a sequel to my OG 1st TriJam game: https://jdzsk.itch.io/acceptable-or-not-ducks

How to play:

You work as a sorter in a Duck Factory. Sort the ducks according to colors and earn score. The Duck Factory has 3 strike policy, so you only have a chance to screw up 3 times before you're fired! Good luck!
